base64.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
base64.description: Convert text to Base64 encoding or decode Base64 strings back to text
base64.inputDescription: Enter the text you want to encode to Base64
base64.base64InputDescription: Enter the Base64 string you want to decode
base64.aboutDescription: Base64 is a binary-to-text encoding scheme that represents binary data in an ASCII string format. It's commonly used for encoding data in email, web URLs, and other text-based protocols.

aboutFeatures.size: Base64 encoding increases the size by approximately 33%
aboutFeatures.characters: It uses A-Z, a-z, 0-9, +, / characters (64 total)
aboutFeatures.padding: Padding with = characters is used when needed
